titleStmt.title: A letter from the King of Denmark to Mr. William Lilly: occasioned by the death of his patron the King of Sweden.

notesStmt.note: A satire. Not in fact by Frederick III, King of Denmark and Norway.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Marsh. 22. 1659"; the last two numbers in the imprint have beed crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
